text: Several VCs have flagged actionable, personalized insights as a must-have differentiator, especially as we position ourselves against larger fintech incumbents.
To meet this expectation and demonstrate traction, we propose a key performance indicator: 90% of parents actively view their teenâ€™s spending insights at least once per month.
A/B testing against a control group will help validate engagement lift and message effectiveness.
All data handling and delivery will remain COPPA-compliant to ensure safe and responsible usage for our under-13 segment.
